about_the_game: Nuclei is a puzzle-platform video game in which you control a robot that must escape from the factory where it was created after suffering a short circuit in the production line. To do this, it will use various components and objects that will grant it multiple skills, necessary to overcome the obstacles that it will encounter in its adventure designed to also be enjoyed in cooperative multiplayer format.
